nolspotlex.v1
Class Character

java.lang.Object
  nolspotlex.v1.Character

public class Character
extends java.lang.Object

This class is part of the "World of NolsPotLex" application. "World of NolsPotLex" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Character" represents a person in the scenery of the game. He can give you some indications.

Version:
2011.10.25
Author:
Alexandre Boursier & Nolan Potier

Character

public Character(java.lang.String name,
